messages.content: Dear Voter, I have lived in the Constituency for 37 years. I am standing to ensure that the will of the British people is fulfilled. UKIP is the party that guarantees BREXIT. I have the necessary skills and experience to be your MP. I know the workings of local government. As a trustee of a Charity caring for people with learning disabilities I understand the practical difficulties afftecting the Care sector. This Constituency has many challenges e.g. policing, NHS, transport, planning. I will represent everyone. Yours sincerely, Duncan Strachan

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Theresa May completely failed to control immigration as Home Secretary and since she’s been in government net immigration has risen by more than 1.8 million people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: WASTING YOUR MONEY ON FOREIGN AID
keyPolicies.policyDescription: She is fully committed to bingeing £14 billion a year of your money on so-called foreign ‘aid.’
The Tories have U-turned on their pledge to scrap the hated ECHR. It currently stops us deporting criminals and even makes us pay them compensation.
She won’t commit to protecting our fishermen from future Brussels controls.
Since 2010, May’s Tories have paid £50 billion of EU membership fees and could have employed tens of thousands of nurses for our NHS.
Police have been cut by 20,000 officers and armed forces by 30,000 since 2010.

If Labour self-destructs and the Lib Dems sell us out to the EU, only UKIP will fight to get the best deal for our country in the future.

WASTING YOUR MONEY ON FOREIGN AID: She is fully committed to bingeing £14 billion a year of your money on so-called foreign ‘aid.’
EUROPEAN COURT OF HUMAN RIGHTS: The Tories have U-turned on their pledge to scrap the hated ECHR. It currently stops us deporting criminals and even makes us pay them compensation.
BRITAIN’S FISHING WATERS: She won’t commit to protecting our fishermen from future Brussels controls.
NHS AND SOCIAL CARE CRISIS: Since 2010, May’s Tories have paid £50 billion of EU membership fees and could have employed tens of thousands of nurses for our NHS.
NATIONAL SECURITY UNDERMINED: Police have been cut by 20,000 officers and armed forces by 30,000 since 2010.
If Labour self-destructs and the Lib Dems sell us out to the EU, only UKIP will fight to get the best deal for our country in the future.
